meanings.definition: Feel regret or remorse for (an action)
meanings.sent1: After forgetting his friend's birthday, he was rueing his mistake.
meanings.sent2: She was rueing her decision to skip the important meeting.
meanings.sent3: While rueing his burnt toast, he couldn't help but laugh at his cooking skills.
meanings.sent4: The old man sat by the window, rueing the lost opportunities of his youth.
meanings.sent5: The image of the abandoned puppy left her rueing her choice not to adopt it.

meanings.definition: Express regret or sorrow for (an action)
meanings.sent1: She was rueing her absence from the family gathering.
meanings.sent2: He spent the evening rueing his harsh words to his sister.
meanings.sent3: The comedian rueing his bad joke made the audience chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The artist stood rueing the accidental brush stroke that ruined his masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The student was rueing the procrastination that led to a late submission.
